channel.title: How to disable the gamepad?
channel.description:
I plugged in my Logitech F510 (the brand endorsed by Valve) and BM detects it.
However, the controls are not the default HL2 ones, but some weird configuration.
I'm using Xpadder, a key-press emulator. BM detects my gamepad, which gets in the way of Xpadder.
How do I prevent BM from responding to my gamepad? [b][COLOR='SandyBrown'] Solution: just unbind everything[/SIZE][/b]
